about_the_game:
Let the heavy machinery go! Transform your hideaway into a coal-powered command centre. Dark clouds and dust rise from pipes protruding here and there, turning this cosy nook into a place where the atmosphere is heavy, sweat pours from the forehead and hard work is the basis of everyday life.

This DLC includes a package of skins to decorate the base. These include:
  • metal chimneys from which black smoke is emitted
  • metal decorations for crafting tables (e.g. metal bars, pipes, chains, fans)
  • pieces of coal mixed with chernobylite

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660/GTX 1050/GTX 770M or AMD Radeon R7 260/Integrated Ryzen 7 4800H
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
